title: Residence领地插件1.9，玩家圈地后还可以破坏
author: KTR
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... esidence&page=1
用的就是这个帖子的,最新的,但是玩家圈地以后设置不能破坏，结果熊孩子还是能破坏，求解决

replies.author: jin7568866
replies.txt_content:
residence.bypass.build - 无视 build false flag
residence.bypass.destroy - 无视 destroy false flag
权限删除
